# Industrybrains

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="industrybrains"
  data-width="300"
  data-height="250"
  data-cid="19626-3798936394"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration semantics, see [Industrybrains documentation](https://www.industrybrains.com/doc/publisher-solutions).

Supported parameters:

-   `data-cid`
-   `data-width`
-   `data-height`
